body: @shockwave311 I can't understand japanese either, but going by the mythology it is probably Persephone. This being because Aphrodite and her shared the mortal Adonis for 1/3 year each (later on Aphrodite got 2/3 of ever year). Adonis later on gets killes by Ares, who was in the last chapter of this hentai screwing Aphrodite. Also Adonis technically was created because of Aphrodite because she waa jeolous of his mother, Myhhra, beauty and cursed his mother to lust after his grandfather, creating him in the process. I have no idea why I'm explaing mythology in the comment section of hentai.
Who's the black haired girl? I can't understand Chinese and she might be a god like Aphrodite..but what's her name????
